summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction and acquisition of an intermediate service concrete lined reservoir, and low service steel tanks, in the vicinity of 6th Avenue Southwest, and West Cloverdale, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as being included in the additions and betterments to and extensions of the municipal water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 58624, authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
